title: 05/14/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/14/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by an eclectic group. Great writer Wright Thompson joins us to discuss Bob Baffert's legacy. Good Morning Football's Peter Schrager explains why the Bears are the perfect fit for Justin Fields. And The Mayor of Flavortown, Guy Fieri tells us which meat is easiest to mess up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by an eclectic group. Great writer Wright Thompson joins us to discuss Bob Baffert's legacy. Good Morning Football's Peter Schrager explains why the Bears are the perfect fit for Justin Fields. And The Mayor of Flavortown, Guy Fieri tells us which meat is easiest to mess up.
